planner_payload.notes: Apply and keep minimal, behavior-preserving lint fixes in two spots: backend/app/sqlalchemy_py313_compat.py (single f-string; use shared _PATCH_ATTRIBUTE via setattr) and frontend/src/app/lib/forms/signal-forms.ts (use store.update(updater)). If any additional lint errors appear, fix them surgically in-place without expanding scope or changing tooling/config. No dependency or config changes.
planner_payload.tests: Backend: `ruff check backend` and `cd backend && pytest -q`. Frontend: `cd frontend && npm run lint`, `npm test -- --watch=false`, optional `npm run build`.
